name: Friday Night Biden'
description:
WARNING: EPILEPTIC SEISURES (PLURAL) WILL OCCUR. 

>>Audiovisual experience<<

Play as Joe Biden in a flashing-lights funny noise rhythm game with a plethora of easter eggs.

Song 1 "Dk Rap" by Nintendo maybe???  Song 2 is royalty free so I am not obliged to give credit to Trevor Garrod for his song Crush which I have dubbed "Trash."  Song 3 is by queen, but is covered by Donald Trump.  I made song 4 using a tts generator

Menu navigation with mouse. Arrow keys for notes. WASD not advised. 1 = Increase volume 0 = decrease volume (10% increments) Custom controls may be specified by pressing an arrow as well as t.
